body.name: Girnoor Corded Stick Vacuum Cleaner, Powerful 600W 20Kpa Stick Vacuum with LED Floor Brush 6-in-1 Self-Standing&Multi-Tool, Lightweight Handheld Vacuum for Hardwood Floor Carpet Pet Hair G160
features: 💝The Ultimate Home Cleaning Solution: Designed to Cater to All Your Cleaning Needs, This Mighty Lightweight Corded Stick Vacuum will be Your Perfect Home Cleaning Helper.

☀️20KPA & 600W Powerful Suction: The G165 vacuum cleaner for home is equipped with a 600W upgraded motor that delivers an unparalleled suction power of up to 20Kpa, ensuring easily picking up pet hair, cat litter, and even microscopic debris. Giving you a quiet and efficient cleaning experience like never before.

☀️Effortless Storage with Self-Supporting Design: Say goodbye to cluttered home spaces with our innovative self-supporting design. Our vacuum cleaner can stand on its own, no longer requires leaning against walls or additional support, maximizing convenience and freeing up valuable space in your home. Additionally, the convenient power cord hooks keep organized cord storage, enhancing your life qualities in ways you never imagined.

☀️4-Layer Deep Filtration System: With the advanced 4-stage HEPA filtration system, our corded vacuum creates a new level of cleanliness. It not only captures large particles but also traps micro dust as small as 0.7um. Its cyclone technology reduces bulk and prevents obstructions, ensuring that only clean air flows through the turbine.

☀️LIGHTWEIGHT & MULTIFUNCTION: With a main motor weighing just 3.04 pounds and an ergonomic handle, this lightweight vacuum cleaner allows one-hand operation and easily converts from a stick vacuum to a handheld vacuum with two versatile attachments. Clean every corner of your home easily, leaving no dirt untouched.

☀️Enhanced Flexible LED Motorized Floor Brush: Flexible 180° and 90° rotation makes it possible to for the vacuum cleaner clean your home in all directions. 3 LED lights help vacuum cleaner illuminate hidden dust and dirt debris around the home.

☀️Handle Every Cleaning Task: With its included dusting brush and crevice tool, easily assembled into six unique combinations using the retractable metal tube, our vacuum masters every cleaning challenge. The dust brush is ideal for cleaning sofas, hard surface furniture, curtains, etc., while the crevice tool is perfect for car crevices and various small corners. Please be confident all your cleaning needs will be met effortlessly.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Converts to a handheld vacuum Converts into a portable handheld vacuum cleaner to tackle sofa and furniture cleaning with greater ease and convenience. Lightweight The ergonomic handle requires only one hand to clean high places, such as curtains and ceiling fans. LED flexible floor brush The floor brush with LED light won't let trash into any corners, allowing you to see and clean all the dust under dark corners, such as beds or sofas. Easy-To-Empty Dust Cup Empty dust and trash from the dust cup at the touch of a button. The Girnoor vacuum cleaner will keep your fingers clean as it empties the collected dirt. SELF-STANDING This vacuum wand is self-supporting, it doesn't need any support during or after cleaning, and it doesn't need to be against a wall, so it can be placed anywhere.

Previous page Upgraded powerful motor Powerful suction power for a wide range of floor cleaning and trash, for all your cleaning needs! Next page 1 Efficient filtration 2 Wide application 3 Easy to Store

Does this vacuum cleaner come with an extra filter? Yes, the main motor comes with a filter and there is another one in the box. Is the long tube telescopic? If so, how long was it when it stretched? Thanks! It is. The machine is about 38 inches before unfolding and 47 inches high when fully extended. Where can I get spare parts? You can contact the seller, they are very friendly and will help you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY IT! Awesome power in a compact size!
reviews.reviewText: First let me say I was not expecting much because I did not know this brand. So taking it out of the box, putting it together using it for the first time… I was looking for things I did not like, and they just didn’t come. I am absolutely wild by this little machine. The suction on it is very strong so unless you have a tight knit rug, I would not use this on carpet or things like that. But for a hardwood floors, oh my gosh, it’s the best thing ever. It’s so lightweight, and transitions to the other options so easily. I usually find it cumbersome to break apart to use the hand vac etc., but this is an easy push of the button and you’re done. I thought I finally found something wrong in that it was too short, and I found myself wishing it was a little longer as I used it, and then, as I was putting it away, I realized I missed a little extension button, so you can completely adjust its height. It’s very lightweight which is cool , it stands on its own even cooler, and though mine doesn’t have cord wraps, it goes around the top of it just fine. Because it’s so thin and compact it goes underneath even my lowest nightstands, you can get to the wall with just about any piece of furniture with this thing and not have to move it! I could not love this vacuum more . I hope it holds up!!! ONLY complaint is the attachment for the handvac piece does not stay on the stick very well. Nicely made & thought out for the design!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Powerful Quiet Lightweight Vacuum
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Let me just say how much I love this vacuum. I recently switched over from having a cordless vacuum but unfortunately after three months, the battery would not stay charged as long, so I was not able to finish vacuuming some of the rooms in my house before the battery would die. This vacuum, however does have a long cord which makes it nice to go room to room. It’s lightweight, the suction is powerful for as small as it is, I haven’t had any issues with it leaving hair or debris that it couldn’t pick up either on carpet or hardwood floors. It’s quieter than most vacuums I’ve owned, and really light weight. I love the fact that you can use it at it’s full length or just use the provided attachments to vacuum the couch, or even your car, which works amazing in all of the crevices. I love the fact that it can stand up on it’s own (however, I am cautious as I do not want to tip over and cause damage to it) so I put it in a hard surface standing up. It also works great on hardwood floors and tile.. The pivotal head with head light gets in all of the small areas you can’t get to or see and the fact that I can vacuum underneath my couch is amazing. I do not own pets however, I have used it to vacuum up pet hair for a family member’s dog, and it worked great. It even picks up sand from children’s shoes. Overall I’m extremely pleased with it especially considering the price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very small gets clogged easily
reviews.reviewText: We have long hair in this household and shed a lot.I guess it’s too much for this little guy! Used it twice and had to unclog it 3 times.Works awesome on our rug and hardwood but is hard to push on our plush carpet.Other than that I love it, light weight and has good suction. The cord is pretty long too!More a backup vacuum rather than a full time ya vacuum lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 100% recommend, Dyson dupe
reviews.reviewText: Bought because someone said it was a dupe for the Dyson. Good price(got on Black Friday for 75$), suction is good, looks good (got in color white and it is white and black so not as light grey as it shows in the cover photo which is fine because I like the black more), has a light which I love to see dust, cord is a good length(found that cord is better than battery powered as those tend to have less suction power and die overtime faster), light weight and not too heavy and stands on its own. Easy to empty. Good for pet owners as there aren’t too many bristles works great I have a dog and three cats.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Love hate with this vacuum
reviews.reviewText: In a year and a half I have now bought 4 of these and it's frustrating.Let's start with the pros:•Has great suction power and literally picks up EVERYTHING it can be a few inches Infront and it will suck it up even stuff right at the baseboards or in corners it gets it!!!•Great on so many different floors including carpet and rugs !•Very lightweight•So easy to use and gets under beds and couches with ease!!***CONS***•You have to empty it often(Not the biggest deal)•The plug part the goes into the wall is super cheap and I have had to replace it twice due to one side breaking off into the wall (I DO NOT PULL IT BY THE CORD I grab by the base!)•They do clog easily BUT EASY TO TAKE APART and unclog.•ONE CAUGHT FIRE the motor part by where you hold it caught fire-i was cleaning a huge 3 story home and I guess it was on too long ...idk.•And just now the brush part that spins at the head has stopped and making a loud LOUD sound.So yes it works but it is like bad quality or something cus I have bought so many in such a short period of time. THEY DONT LAST AT ALL!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this thing
reviews.reviewText: This vacuum works really well and has nice features. It's quiet and has good suction for its size. I don't consider this a commercial duty vacuum, but for around the house it's very handy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great at first...
reviews.reviewText: Pros:Good suctionThe cord makes sure the battery isn't an issueEasy to swivel and cleanEasy to emptyCons:Cheap construction. The locks for the joints broke first then the whole wand got flimsy and weak feeling. I've only had it 2 months. Not sure it will make it 3The filter clogs up nearly immediately and is tough to clean. Not sure why so much dirt gets all the way inside but it doesThe cord is a tad shortThe base is a little heavy for lifting while using the dust brushWhile it can work on carpet, I wouldn't use this as my only vacuum for wall to wall. It does a great job on other floors (versatile with tile, laminate, wood, concrete, etc)I bought this September 3rd. Today is November 15 and it is already having me search for a replacement which makes me sad. I really loved this little vacuum! I just wish it was better made.
I like that it has a cord and won't lose power after only doing one room like the cordless ones do. My whole house is porcelain tile and it vacuums it beautifully!
